segments.text: I'm looking at the left side of the kitchen now, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing precariously on a two-step stool in front of an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching up towards a large jar labeled “COOKIE JAR” inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already deep inside, grabbing some treats, I imagine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch the falling cookies or as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a clever little operation they have going on here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Beside him, a girl stands with her arm raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture shows such eager anticipation, it's really quite charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely focused on their mission, oblivious to the sink disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they're enjoying their secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being incredibly stealthy.
segments.speaker: PAR
